TopicTitle: Include picture of part in contract description

Articles.Content:
It would be nice to have a picture of the test part in the description of the contract. Would save (well, me anyway) from having to go back and forth between the various buildings to look it up.

Thanks
I just came here to make precisely this suggestion! I know a lot of the default parts by name but not all of them. A visual cue like in the VAB would help a lot and be really appreciated! =3
Very much yes, ive tested a few parts that I thought were something else when i accepted the contract. Not a big deal but still would be nice.

This is one of those "polish" things that I'm sure will be added at some point; it's such an obviously good idea that it's hard to think it wouldn't be. It might be a few versions before they revisit the contract UI though.
